Name: Cosmic Ray
About the game: The Earth's sun is about to die. Scientists predict we have, at most, 5 days remaining. The world as we know it is about to end... Cosmic Ray to the rescue! His mission: Explore distant solar systems Colonize inhabitable planets, terraform inhospitable ones Search planets for resources such as upgrade blueprints and alien artifacts Collect ship parts to buy upgrades Thwart alien attacks while avoiding the perils of space Casual gameplay and short rounds make Cosmic Ray a great option for killing a few minutes. Soundtrack Cosmic Ray features a lush, ambient soundtrack featuring music by Snug, JFS and Ogotu. Guaranteed to calm a crying baby in mere seconds.
